title: Did Arizona Superintendent Kathy Hoffman Push for Sex Ed in Kindergarten?
subtitle: Arizona's superintendent of public instruction was the target of several disparaging claims made in a viral Facebook post.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Arizona Superintendent of Public Instruction Kathy Hoffman advocated teaching students about "masturbation and sexual positions" after she was sworn into office with her hand on a Dr. Seuss book.
